name: academy-status-widget
description: Academy Status Widget - Real-time Academy system monitoring and controls

widget_capabilities.real_time_monitoring: 5-second interval updates of Academy system status
widget_capabilities.training_session_tracking: Live progress bars and convergence time estimates
widget_capabilities.p2p_network_status: Network node health and genome synchronization
widget_capabilities.genome_discovery_feed: Recent genome discoveries with performance metrics
widget_capabilities.quick_controls: One-click spawn persona, start training, sync P2P, discover genomes
widget_capabilities.academy_metrics: Active personas, training sessions, P2P connections, genome library size

integration_points.academy_daemon: Real-time status updates via academy.status command
integration_points.genome_discoverer: P2P genome discovery and assembly status
integration_points.base_widget: Extends BaseWidget with declarative HTML/CSS architecture
